page.title: 12A WORKING FARM IN KILTARLITY
page.content: George Fraser works Tomnacross Farm in the east of this block.He has 50 ha. altogether,and keeps 40 breeding cattle,most of which are Herefords, although he has begun to introduce Simmentals and Charolais to his stock. George works all his fields on the traditional 7 year rotation of crops. i.e. year 1 grain(usually barley) year 2 root crop(e.g.turnips) year 3 grain undersown with grass year 4 grass year 5 grass year 6 grass The ground is then ploughed and seeded for a new grain crop(cycle begins again) Tomnacross farm is one of the few in the area to still use this rotation pattern.Many other farmers are growing grain"cash crops" intensively.
